Member Function Documentation

void sbIRemoteLibrary::connectToMediaLibrary ( in AString  aDomain,
in AString  aPath 
)

Parameters:
aPath - this can be either one of our 'magic' ids: main, web, download; or it can be a path. If a path it must adhere to the same restrictions that cookies do in the browser, namely it must be a prefix of the location of the URI. Specifically for the URI: http://foo.bar.com/this/is/my/music/stolen.html the path must be a prefix of 'this/is/my/music/'

create and insert a media item into the library
